description:
At Questify Fitness, we're not just a gym; we're your partner on your journey to a healthier, happier, and more vibrant life. Whether you're a seasoned fitness enthusiast or taking your first steps towards a healthier lifestyle, we're here to support you every step of the way.

As an Entry Level Social Media Assistant at Questify Fitness, you will be responsible for managing and creating content for our social media platforms. Your role involves engaging with the online community, analyzing social media performance, and supporting the development of strategies to enhance our digital presence.

Pay Range: $1150 - $1450 weekly

Full time

Key Responsibilities

  • Create, schedule, and post content across various social media platforms.
  • Monitor and engage with the online community.
  • Analyze social media metrics and generate performance reports.
  • Assist in developing and executing social media campaigns.
  • Collaborate with the marketing team to brainstorm new content ideas.

Skills, Knowledge And Expertise

  • Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field.
  • Familiarity with major social media platforms (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, etc.).
  • Strong written and verbal communication skills.
  • Creative thinking and ability to generate engaging content.
  • Basic knowledge of social media analytics tools.

Benefits

  • Competitive salary
  • Health, dental, and vision insurance
  • Paid time off
  • 401(k) plan
  • Opportunities for professional development
